original_text: But now this is what we’ll do to Gibeah: We’ll go up against it in the order decided by casting lots.
korean_text: 우리가 이제 기브아 사람에게 이렇게 행하리니 곧 제비를 뽑아서 그들을 치되

sentences.original_text: But now this is what we'll do to Gibeah:
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이제 우리가 기봐에게 할 일은 이것입니다:

sentences.original_text: in the order decided by casting lots.
